Name: createPersistentVolumeClaimWithGivenConfigs()
Description: Should create and mount PersistentVolumeClaims using the correct accessMode, storageClass and filesystem user/group overrides

Name: createPersistentVolumeClaimUsingDefaults()
Description: Should create and mount PersistentVolumeClaims using defaults derived from the Entando Operator config properties

Name: minimalDeploymentWithoutResourceLimits()
Description: Should deploy successfully with resource limits disabled

Name: minimalDeploymentWithEnvironmentVariables()
Description: Should reflect both direct custom environment variables and environment variables referring to Secret keys

Name: absoluteMinimalDeployment()
Description: Should deploy successfully even if only the image and port are specified
